divs: Sighting DetailsI was with my dad he went inside of his race car trailer ,and I decided to look up at the sky and I saw a star-like object make several impossible turns and then it took off.
Summary: A speck of light in the sky made several impossible meneuvers and then it just sorta dissappeared
trends: There has been one other sighting in Columbiana
There were no other sightings in Columbiana on or around October 15th 2003
